title: String Matching
content:
Chapter 32

String Matching

VII: Selected Topics

Chapter 32: String Matching

Finding a pattern within a text

Key Points

  • Naive: O(nm) - try each position
  • Rabin-Karp: hashing, O(n+m) expected
  • KMP: O(n+m) worst case, no backtracking
  • Automata: precompute all transitions

Real-World Applications

Text editors, grep, DNA analysis, plagiarism detection
